name: LaTeX caption package bundle

screenshots.caption: Example sub-figures typeset with the `subcaption'  package
Example bi-lingual captions typeset with the `bicaption' package

short_description: This LaTeX package provides many ways to customize the captions in floating environments like figure and table, and cooperates with many other packages. Includes rotating captions, sideways captions, continued captions (for tables or figures that come in several parts). A list of compatibility notes, for other packages, is provided in the documentation. The package also provides the "caption outside float" facility.
summary: This LaTeX package provides ways to customize captions in floats
